name: Flying Tank
description:
THE END OF THE WORLD IS JUST THE BEGINNING




Get into your Flying Tank and shoot 'em up like it's the good old days! Kill strange bosses, drop bombs from above and build an arsenal of fun, powerful weapons. Reclaim the stolen Earth - alone or with a friend - in a rich action-packed side-scrolling shmup!



★ Remote Play Together. Invite your Steam Friends to join your bullet hell adventure.
★ Embark on 24 missions, populated with three distinct factions and unique adversaries.
★ Encounter 6 main bosses and 18+ midi and mini boss fights.
★ Customize your FLT with a variety of Weapons and Bombs, ranging from classic to insane.
★ Use powerful Specials including Bullet-Time and Overdrive, attack and repair Drones, and 30+ other Upgrades.



Original Sound

The sound of Flying Tank is a labor of love crafted by the master sound designer Discofield, with the original soundtrack created by the award-winning music artist Kubatko.
